articles.author: Taylor Lyles
articles.title: Fortnite Drops Support for Windows 7 and 8 Computers - IGN
articles.description: Fortnite will no longer run natively on computers with Windows 7 or 8 operating systems.
articles.content:
If you are excited to play Fortnite Chapter 2 Season 4: MEGA on your PC today, make sure your computer is not running Windows 7 and 8. 
As previously announced, starting with Battle Royale Chapter 4… [+1256 chars]

articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Here Are All The ‘Fortnite’ Chapter 4, Season 2 MEGA Battle Pass Skins - Forbes
articles.description: Another new season of Fortnite has launched. It’s Chapter 4, season 2 now, and Epic has gone with a cyberpunk theme for this MEGA seasons, including the arrival of MEGA City, a neon utiopia POI, and of course, a lot of cyberpunk-ish skins to match.
